notesStmt.note: Fully vocalized, except last two lines; A folio from the Yom Kippur Vidui for the Ne'ilah service, that starts אתה הבדלת אנוש מראש (Sidur Rav Seʻadyah Gaʹon / Israel Davidson [ed.]. Jerusalem : Meḳitse nirdamim, 1963, p. 262), the fragment contains from לעמוד לפניך to אין לנו מוחל (ibid. ll. 9-15). The phrase בכל דור ודור (ibid. l. 15) is missing in this version.
Condition: torn, losses from bottom; verso is blank.
